Author - Staci DumoskiStace Dumoski
email










Chapman Family Donors Make a Collective Impact On Giving Day  With more than $1 million in donations, the event caps one of Chapman’s most successful fundraising years ever.  Thanks to the enthusiasm of the Chapman Family, Chapman University’s fifth annual Giving Day was an unrivaled success. The 24-hour online fundraising event surpassed its goal of 1,000 donations on April 25, raising more...


April 28, 2023 Staci Dumoski

 









Daniel Canogar’s “Pareidolia” Multimedia Artwork Unveiled at Chapman University On April 13, the Phyllis and Ross Escalette Permanent Collection of Art in Wilkinson College of Arts, Humanities, and Social Sciences unveiled its newest artwork installation, “Pareidolia,” by internationally renowned...


April 27, 2023 Staci Dumoski

 









Laurel Tamayo ’21 Inspires Climate-Friendly Action Through Film Laurel Tamayo ’21 was recently named one of Forbes’ 68 Climate Leaders Changing the Film and Television Industry Tamayo is an Impact Campaign Consultant at Rare Entertainment Lab, a behavior change organization that...


April 19, 2023 Staci Dumoski

 









Chapman Giving Day 2023 Sets Goal of 1,000 Donations On Tuesday, April 25, Chapman University will hold its fifth annual Giving Day, an event that asks members of the Chapman community to come together to support student scholarships and extraordinary experiences. ...


April 18, 2023 Staci Dumoski

 









Sandi Simon Center for Dance Ushers in New Era for Dance at Chapman The recently opened Sandi Simon Center for Dance provides a spacious, light-filled home for Chapman’s student dancers to learn and collaborate. After years of planning, development, design and construction, Chapman University’s Sandi Simon Center for Dance celebrated its grand opening on March 27, 2023. Chapman administrators, senior staff, trustees and...


April 12, 2023 Staci Dumoski

 









Angela Bassett to Speak at 2023 Chapman University Commencement Panthers will welcome the “Black Panther: Wakanda Forever” star and Oscar-nominee during the May 19 ceremony, when Bassett will be awarded an honorary degree from the university. Award-winning actress, director and executive producer Angela Bassett will speak at Chapman’s University Commencement on Friday, May 19. Bassett will receive a Doctor of the Arts, (honoris causa) during the commencement...


April 6, 2023 Staci Dumoski

 






Kyle Longley Named the Executive Director of the Society of Military History Kyle Longley, Henry Salvatori Professor of American Values and Traditions and director of the War, Diplomacy, and Society program at Chapman University, has been named the new executive director of the Society...


March 27, 2023 Staci Dumoski

 









Hilbert Museum Breaks Ground on Expansion The HIlbert Museum of California Art celebrated the official groundbreaking of its expansion on Feb. 15. The year-long construction project will triple the size of the museum, including additional galleries, event...


March 20, 2023 Staci Dumoski

 









$1.5 Million From Ferrucci Family Brings Comprehensive Campaign Total to $318 Million The donation will establish the Ferrucci Institute for Italian Experience and Research within Wilkinson College of Arts, Humanities, and Social Sciences.  Chapman University is pleased to announce the creation of the Ferrucci Institute for Italian Experience and Research, thanks to a $1.5 million donation from the Ferrucci family. The gift was announced March 11 during...
